opinion: Go early or late or you'll be waiting quite awhile
likes the skillets and the benedicts
Very busy and for good reason
The wait wasnt as long as we expected given the number of people waiting
Parking lot is packed but there seemed to be plenty of street parking nearby
Pretty crowded though, even at 2PM for brunch (on a Sunday, granted). I would expect to wait quite a bit at an earlier hour.
One of the best breakfast places
who knows, 3rd times a charm right?!
good place to spend your Saturday morning

aspect: Opportunity to eat at Bills Cafe
opinion: I don't have the opportunity to eat at Bills Cafe as much as I'd like
Its usually less busy after 1:30/2:00 but still early enough for brunch. Sadly they close at 3:00.
free soup with a sandwich or burger is always a plus, and the soup really good
super prompt service, didnt even have to ask for refills on the soda or coffee
parking lot is packed but there seemed to be plenty of street parking nearby
The only saving grace is that they serve alcoholic breakfast beverages

aspect: Greek yogurt with honey and strawberries

opinion: Fantastic place, great food and people
